input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.span:
In response to the coronavirus outbreak, the Shaker Heights City School District buildings are closed.
The District has developed a detailed multiple-leveled extended closure plan and resources to support our students. Our closure plan includes information on instruction, virtual learning plans, student and staff expectations, distribution of meals for students who receive free or reduced meals and special education supports.
Click here to review the District's Extended School Closure Resources and Plan.

br.span: Enroll your student for the 2020-21 school year online and submit all necessary paperwork via computer or phone!

li.a: Extended Closure Tech Resources & Chromebook Support
Extended School Closure Event and Travel Cancellations

div.span: Shaker Heights Schools students, staff and families should use this website section as a resource reference during our extended school closure. OurCommunications Team will update this section regularly so that it includes the most up-to-date information.

ul.li: Learning & Teaching Plans and Resources (including plans by building- and grade-level)

a.strong: Technology Support Resources for Students, Staff and Families
Extended School Closure Event and Travel Cancellations
Shaker Heights Schools Extended School Closure Plan

span.div: During this extended closure, we also encourage our school community to check email frequently, as that will become our primary mode of sharing information from the District.

If you are not receiving District emails, please follow the instructions in Using Express Update to Update Your Student's Information.Completing this process ensures our systems have the most up-to-date contact information for families.

We understand that some students may need additional emotional support during this extended closure. Students and concerned family members may request additional emotional support by completing this Request for Emotional Support form.

Your request will be directed to an appropriate staff member. In addition, school counselors, school psychologists and social workers are establishing office hours. More information on hours will be shared when it becomes available.

div.span:

Shaker Heights, OH. 44120

div.div: If any of the material on this page is not accessible to you or you have questions, please send us an email or call us via our contact page and we will provide alternatives.
